item.title: 12 Links of Transcendant Dependant Origination
item.description: Avijjā → saṅkhāra → viññāṇa → nāma-rūpa → saḷāyatana → phassa → vedanā → taṇhā → upādāna → bhava → jāti → suffering (dukkha) → faith (saddhā) → joy (pāmojja) → delight (pīti) → tranquillity (passaddhi; ‘relaxation’) → happiness (sukha) → concentration (samādhi) → knowledge and vision according to reality (yathābhūta-ñāṇadassana) → disenchantment (nibbidā) → dispassion (virāga) → liberation (vimutti) → knowledge of the destruction of mental defilement (khaya-ñāṇa)

item.title: 16 steps of breath meditation
item.description: The 16 steps of breath meditation: Breathing in long one discerns, ―I‘m breathing in long; or breathing out long, one discerns, ―I‘m breathing out long.
